description: The showdown between the best and the worst is underway! Yoshii`s crew unleashes with all they`ve got against Class A, battling all over campus - and above it. Will Class F`s training finally pay off?

titles.title: Ai to Yuuki to Ore-tachi no Tatakai wa Kore kara Da! (Kari)
Amor, Coragem E A Nossa Luta Acabou De Começar!
Love, Courage and Our Battle Has Just Begun!
愛と勇気と俺たちの戦いはこれからだ! (仮)
